html: nourish a young cow, and two sheep. This speaks of the poverty of those who remain in Judah after the Assyrian invasion. Residents who are permitted to remain in the land will be poor in comparison to the prewar years. They will no longer possess large herds of cattle or large vineyards (7:23). They will own only two sheep and a young cow, and they will find it a struggle to nourish their livestock.
